snippet: The event resurrected signature applause lines and carried the hallmarks of Mr. Trump’s whiplash style during the election: indicting and promising, nostalgic and forward-looking....
abstract: Pres-elect Donald J Trump embarks on unconventional tour of campaign-style rallies across America to thank voters for their support ahead of his January inauguration; speeches have been filled with self-congratulatory statements and type of sweepingly disparaging rhetoric that was controversial hallmark of his campaign.

byline.original: By NICK CORASANITI and MICHAEL D. SHEAR
byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti reported from Cincinnati, and Michael D. Shear from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The event resurrected signature applause lines and carried the hallmarks of Mr. Trump’s whiplash style during the election: indicting and promising, nostalgic and forward-looking.

headline.main: Trump Kicks Off ‘Thank You’ Tour, Reveling in Crowd and Campaign Themes
headline.print_headline: Boasts, Jeers and Some Jabs  as Trump Opens Victory Tour
